homepageTitle: Ready to improve your typing speed?
homepageDescription: Start practicing your typing now with our free app. Choose from a variety of texts and speed challenges to practice and improve your typing speed. Log in to track your progress and challenge your friends to see who is faster.
loginMessage2: Log in to track your progress and challenge your friends to see who is the fastest.
